summary: Tensions rise within an asbestos cleaning crew as they work in an abandoned mental hospital with a horrific past that seems to be coming back.
cast: David Caruso|Stephen Gevedon|Paul Guilfoyle|Josh Lucas|Peter Mullan|Brendan Sexton III|Charley Broderick|Lonnie Farmer|Larry Fessenden|Jurian Hughes|Sheila Stasack|Linda Carmichael|Sean Daly
title: Session 9
